name: Grom the Blacksmith
description: A burly dwarf with soot-covered hands and a friendly smile.
dialogue: I make the finest weapons in town.

name: Aldric the Mysterious
description: An elderly wizard in flowing purple robes.
dialogue: You are a powerful wizard who speaks in riddles and offers cryptic advice. You sell magical items but are selective about your customers.

name: Martha the Innkeeper
description: A cheerful woman who runs the local tavern.
dialogue: Can I get you something to drink?
